tweet.text: “Why is Yalta important today? Not because we in the West want to reopen old disputes over boundaries; far from it. The reason Yalta remains important is that the freedom of Europe is unfinished business.” —Pres. Reagan, Feb. 1985 🎙️@Reagan_Library https://t.co/BNFDgUDXZ4 (2/2)
tweet.html: “Why is Yalta important today? Not because we in the West want to reopen old disputes over boundaries; far from it. The reason Yalta remains important is that the freedom of Europe is unfinished business.” —Pres. Reagan, Feb. 1985 🎙️@Reagan_Library ow.ly/bTLw50KCY2R (2/2)
